product_metadata.title: 30 Year Term Insurance Policy
product_metadata.target_audience: Ideally for those starting new families, planning retirement in 30 years, or with long-term loans
product_metadata.coverage_amount_focus: Flexible Sum Assured (Coverage Duration Focus: 30 Years)

product_summary.objective: To provide financial protection and income replacement for a fixed tenure of 30 years.

plan_variants.description: Pure term insurance with death benefit valid for 30 years.
Premiums paid are refunded on maturity if the insured survives the 30-year policy tenure.

core_benefits.description: Sum assured paid to the nominee if the insured passes away during the 30-year policy tenure.
No benefit under normal term plans. Return of Total Premiums Paid available under Return of Premium variant.
Premiums eligible for deduction under Section 80C. Death benefit tax-free under Section 10(10D).

special_options: Life Stage Benefit (increase sum assured at milestones)

compliance_rules.disclaimer: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions. Please read the sales brochure and policy document carefully before purchase.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Section 80C and Section 10(10D) of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Consult your tax advisor.

retrieval_chunks.text: A 30-year term insurance policy offers life cover for a fixed tenure of 30 years. It ensures financial protection during critical years.
The premium amount is fixed throughout the 30-year policy tenure, shielding you from inflation and age-based hikes.
Ideal for covering long-term liabilities like home loans, ensuring your family isn't burdened with debt.
Option to get a refund of total premiums paid if you survive the 30-year policy term.

Suitable for new families, those planning retirement in 30 years, and home loan borrowers.
